real_queries: What is the patent process ?
Patenting process is not directly related to IIC.
How to contact IIC
You can reach to us at 011-29581223, 1239, 1241
NAAC live grade changed
You can update the information by your self under institute details
ARIIA Ranking format
You can download the requested data from the Download section of your IIC home page.
How to get ppt of orientation sessions ?
You can download it from IIC website after login. It was also provided in Regional Whatsapp Group
How to check IIC2.0 Calendar Plan ?
Calendar Plan is uploaded under Downloads in Menu
How to change name of Institute head ?
You can edit it by logging in to your IIC account.
How to change E-Mail address for correspondence ?
You can change the necessary details under my council section in the portal after login
How to make a correction in College name ?
To Change name you need to call on 01129581513
How to change my college name ?
To Change name you need to call on 01129581513
How to upload the details of self driven activities?
Click on activity and add self driven activity under self driven tab and then click on My calendar activity to upload the report
How to add IIC President's details?

You can add the information under my council section after login.
If problem still persists contact at 9805484989
Can I use the IIC logo
There is no requirement of approval for use of IIC logo.
Can I use the MIC logo
Use of MIC logo requires permission.
Regarding entry of data and information of our self driven activity in the portal
Please call on 011 29581513.
How to add something on News Corner?

When you add activity under self driven there is a option - 'Do you want to announce under News Corner in IIC portal?'(Please note that if external participants are also invited then click this option). If you click yes then request will go to admin for approval.  After approval it will be displayed in news corner.
how to upload institute logo in add social media details?

Under Social Media Tab in My council Menu.
If any difficulties, please call on 29581513
How to submit forth coming events to be get displayed in the news corner

Go to newsroom section and generate a request for upcoming event to be displayed in portal.
For more information, please refer the help doc available on IIC portal.
When will the Innovation Ambassador Training Schedule be published ?

It is already published -
https://mic.gov.in/institute/images/IASchedule.png
How to get funding for a Project ?
Please submit your prototype in IIC Innovation contest 2020. Shortlisted projects will get funding and mentoring support.
custom_queries:
A network of IICs are established to promote innovation and entrepreneurship in the Institution through multitudinous modes leading to an innovation promotion ecosystem in the campuses. A network of more than 950 IICs were established on 21st November 2018.
Click below for more details -
https://iic.mic.gov.in/assets/html/index.html

A network of IICs are established to promote innovation and entrepreneurship in the Institution through multitudinous modes leading to an innovation promotion ecosystem in the campuses. A network of more than 950 IICs were established on 21st November 2018. For more details -
https://iic.mic.gov.in/assets/html/index.html
What are the major focus of IIC?

Major Focus are as follows:-
1. To create a vibrant local innovation ecosystem.
2. Start-up supporting mechanism in HEIs.
3. Prepare institute for Atal Ranking of institutions on innovation achievements framework.
4. Establish the function ecosystem for scouting ideas and pre-incubation of ideas.
5. Develop better cognitive ability among students.

Check out more -
https://iic.mic.gov.in/assets/html/index.html
What are the functions of IIC?
Qualification required to apply for IIC.

IIC 2.0 is an upgraded version of IIC 1.0 which was inaugurated on 21st November 2018. IIC 2.0 is more comprehensive and will be able to establish a strong ecosystem of innovation, IPR and entrepreneurship in HEIs. For more details -
https://iic.mic.gov.in/assets/html/IIC20.html

IIC 2.0 is an upgraded version of IIC 1.0 which was inaugurated on 21st November 2018. IIC 2.0 is more comprehensive and will be able to establish a strong ecosystem of innovation, IPR and entrepreneurship in HEIs. For more details -
https://iic.mic.gov.in/assets/html/IIC20.html
What are the new features of IIC 2.0?

The new features of IIC 2.0 are as follows:-
1. Introduction of Semester Based Approach for Preparing and Advising Annual Calendar Plan for IICs.
2. Development and Prescribe Learning Modules for the Activities along with the Annual Calendar Plan.
3. Accommodate Self Driven and MIC Driven Activities and Differential Weightage as Measure of Performance.
4. Capturing IICs Activities on Monthly Basis and Report Generation on Quarterly Basis.
5. Introduction of New Scoring Mechanism for Rating & Quarterly Rating - Incentive System
For more details -
https://iic.mic.gov.in/assets/html/Activities1.html
